item.title: Vodafone confirms large job cuts due to Covid-19
item.description:
Vodafone New Zealand is estimating more than 100 jobs could be cut as the company addresses the impact of Covid-19.
A spokeswoman said 5-7 per cent of its roughly 2000-strong workforce could be cut thank ...
